name: In re Nomination Petition of Robert M. HODIES, Democratic Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 156th District, Appeal of Roland H. Woodward, Cross-Appeal of Robert M. Hodies

judges: Before: ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Robert M. HODIES, Democratic Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 156th District, Appeal of Roland H. Woodward, Cross-Appeal of Robert M. Hodies.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of May, 2002, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John George Bravacos, West Chester, for Roland H. Woodward.
Samuel C. Stretton, West Chester, for Robert M. Hodies.
casebody.head_matter:
796 A.2d 966
In re Nomination Petition of Robert M. HODIES, Democratic Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 156th District, Appeal of Roland H. Woodward, Cross-Appeal of Robert M. Hodies.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 15, 2002.
John George Bravacos, West Chester, for Roland H. Woodward.
Samuel C. Stretton, West Chester, for Robert M. Hodies.
Before: ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
